title: David Lammy – 2021 Comments on Women and the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Lammy, the Shadow Secretary of State for Justice, on 14 March 2021.
content:
In the 20 schedules, 176 clauses and 296 pages of the Conservatives’ Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill, “women” are not mentioned even once.
